attributes.action: Order a review of Public Liability Insurance requirements for traditional British past-times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many traditional past-times in Britain are under threat as councils demand organisers pay for Public Liability Insurance.  The free events are inevitably cancelled when the organisers are unable to find the funds.  We believe that it is detrimental to our society that traditional events that sometimes go back hundreds of years can no longer be enjoyed by the people.
